```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
#Загрузим необходимые пакеты.
library(readr)
library(readxl)
library(dplyr)
library(tibble)
library(psych)
library(tidyr)
library(tibble)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
#код для группировки всех признаков по сроку гестации

D2008_2010 <- read_rds ("D2008_2010.rds")

D2008_2010 %>% 
  select(`gest`, where(is.numeric)) %>% 
  group_by(`gest`) %>% 
  summarise (across(where(is.numeric), function(x) mean (x, na.rm =T))) %>% 
  round(2)

D2008_2010 %>% 
  select(`gest`, where(is.numeric)) %>% 
  group_by(`gest`) %>% 
  summarise (across(where(is.numeric), function(x) sd (x, na.rm =T)))  %>% 
  round(2)

D2008_2010 %>% 
  select(`gest`, where(is.numeric)) %>% 
  group_by(`gest`) %>% 
  summarise (across(where(is.numeric), function(x) quantile(x, probs = seq(0.05, 0.95, 0.45), na.rm = T, names = TRUE, type = 7))) %>% 
  round(2)
```
